name: Pierce's Pong
description:
Pierce's Pong is a tennis game. You can use 2 people to play, one can be on the right side of the keyboard and the other person could be on the left side of the keyboard. 

Controls, If your on the right side of a keyboard use arrow keys up and down to move your paddle. If your on the left side of a keyboard use w and s to move your paddle up and down.
